effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Fire Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Fire Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 987,784 Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 7,489 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of the Darkspear Trolls.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
